content.description: Start matched on a rail and climb the Arete to a tall but easy topout.
content.location: If you follow the "trail" it will be one of the first problems you get to. It's right in the middle of the first rocks you see in the boulder field. Walk up and past it to get to the Electric Island Boulder and Tofurkey Boulder areas. Keep right to get to the Shots Fired and Warmups areas.

climbs.name: Unknown Warmup Problem - Grade is an estimate

content.description: Start on some interesting iron features.
content.location: Slightly up the hill from the Shots Fired boulder.

content.description: Start sitting and climb up.
content.location: Take a left at Welcome to the Whitcombs and head to the southwest corner of the boulder field. This one is on the middle boulder between Bice and Brice.

content.description: Sit start and climb up.
content.location: Slightly up the hill from the Shots Fired boulder.

content.description: Fun slab to the left of Flat Cat.
content.location: Tofurkey Boulder.

content.description: A classic anywhere. Start as low as possible on the right side, climb left into the arete.
Backside of the Tofurkey boulder, stand start with hands on rail, climb right into the crescents. Slam dunk the last move
Climb the arete to the right of Prolific.Formerly an undone line, but fully cleaned and climbed on 01/12/21.
content.location: Right of Prolific.

content.description: Start in 2 Huecos and move up and right to a jug. Tricky for some.
content.location: Just up the rock stairway from Welcome to the Whitcombs.If you follow the "trail" it will be one of the first problems you get to. It's right in the middle of the first rocks you see in the boulder field. Walk up and past it to get to the Electric Island Boulder and Tofurkey Boulder areas. Keep right to get to the Shots Fired and Warmups areas.

content.description: Downclimb off the Shots Fired boulder. Can also be climbed as a boulder problem.
Starting on a decent left hand with a right hand small undercling, make a big right move onto a rail, moving right then going to the top.
Start from an obvious just at about waist height, and then climb the scoop! Overlooked, but fun.
content.location: On it's own on the left just before getting to the Shots Fired boulder.

content.description: Start on a low rail, climb straight up to a tricky top out, and finish on a slab. There are several ways to do this problem, and they all are about the same difficulty. Seasonably wet, so be ready to brush the top holds and the slab. Would be 3 stars if this wasn't the case.
content.location: To the right of Iron Efficiency/Slightly up the hill from the Shots Fired boulder.

content.description: Start sitting, and climb up.
content.location: If you are facing Tofurkey it is just down and to the right.

content.description: Start standing on the arete, move onto the face, and top out straight up.
content.location: Just down the hill from the Aftershave boulder.Up and to the left of the Shots Fired boulder.

content.description: Start sitting with left hand on a jug just around the left side of the arete, and right hand on the arete. Climb up until you reach a few good holds, and then trend left onto the slab to top out.
content.location: To the left of Tim Duncan side of the Tofurkey boulder.

content.description: Start using the same holds as FE, but trend left avoiding the other holds on FE. Climb over the bulge using some small crimps and slopers. Pretty contrived/an eliminate, but fun!
content.location: Slightly up the hill from the Shots Fired boulder.

content.description: Sit start and climb up some tough moves. The top is super mossy as of 2021. Bring a brush!
content.location: To the right of High Voltage.

content.description: Super fun mantle just to the left of the Lil Earle start. Harder than it looks.
Start at the bottom corner of the obvious lip and traverse it all the way until the end. Then top out.
content.location: Up the hill and to the right of the Tofurkey boulder.Just up the hill and to the left of the Aftershave boulder.

content.description: Start sitting and climb the Arete.
content.location: Just down the hill from the Aftershave boulder.Up and to the left of the Shots Fired boulder.

content.description: Start sitting, and do some super interesting moves to the top. Can be frustrating, but is oddly SUPER fun.
content.location: Just up the hill from Lil Earle on the uphill side of a massive boulder.

content.description: Climb the tall slab on small but positive holds.
content.location: Left of Moth to a Flame/Opposite of Tim Duncan

content.description: Start sitting and climb up.
content.location: Up the hill from the Shots Fired boulder.

content.description: Start sitting with left hand pinch, and a right hand in a crumbly hueco. Bust left to a crimp on the arete then move right to the top. Avoid the sketchy Jack-O-Lantern pocket on the left unless you want to get bit.
content.location: Up the hill from Lil Earle/To the right of Jingo Wobbly.

content.description: Start sitting with low sidepulls. Climb straight up.
content.location: Slightly up the hill from the Shots Fired boulder.

content.description: Start sitting on a left hand knob, and right hand jug. Traverse into Iron Efficiency to top out. Some sharp holds make this problem a little annoying.
content.location: Slightly up the hill from the Shots Fired boulder.

content.description: Start sitting on two good crimps and climb straight up.
content.location: On the boulder slightly up the hill from the Shot Fired boulder.

content.description: Start with a low left hand side pull and a higher right hand pinch/side pull, and climb up.
content.location: Slightly up the hill from the Shots Fired boulder.

content.description: Start with bad side-pulls, and use tricky beta to get to the top.The original starting hold is broken, but the problem should still be doable.
content.location: To the right of Black Out on the Electric Island boulder (just south of the Tofurkey boulder.

content.description: Start on the left side of boulder, move up into an undercling, then out onto the face using crimps.
Start on Iron Efficiency and traverse into the James Webb Memorial problem.
content.location: Slightly up the hill from the Shots Fired boulder.

content.description: Left arete on the Tofurkey boulder, if you're facing Tofurkey
Start sitting and climb the obvious fin. Can be topped to the left of straight up. A lot easier for taller folks, so the grade kind of meets in the middle.Pronounced "feen."
content.location: Facing opposite of Prolific/Just behind the boulder that hosts Irony.

content.description: Start sitting on good holds. Move slightly right to a bulge, and find the holds for the top out.
content.location: Slightly up the hill from the Shots Fired boulder.

content.description: Starting on the rail, follow the center line straight up. An undone sit start would be possible to add to the grade.

climbs.name: DNF Project (change the name when you send - grade is an estimate)

content.description: Start standing and climb the cool Arete.
content.location: The obvious Arete to the right of Aftershave.

content.description: Start on the right side of shots fired boulder on the chalked crimps, go straight up and into the shots fired top out
Climb the blunt arete.
content.location: Caddy cornered from Leggo My Eggo.Just down the hill from the Aftershave boulder.Up and to the left of the Shots Fired boulder.

content.description: Fun slab to the left of Turducken. Probably needs a fresh brushing.There are toprope anchors on this slab left by Jason Mellor.
content.location: Tofurkey boulder.

content.description: Start standing and climb up to a dirty top out. Fun move to a scary finish. Once the top gets cleaned up this one will gain a star.
content.location: Just up the hill from Lil Earle and slightly to the right.

content.description: Climb the short face from a sit to a dirty top out. Brush the top for a more enjoyable experience.
content.location: Right behind Brass Knuckles. About 100 feet to the right of Black Out/Electric Island boulder.

content.description: Slab on the left side of the Shots Fired boulder, needs a brush
Stand start on ok holds and hop to the top!
content.location: Just to the left of Black Out on the Electric Island boulder (Just south of the Tofurkey boulder).

content.description: Start sitting on the left hand side of the boulder, and move onto the face to get to the top. Kind of tricky. The top likely needs a brushing.
content.location: Take a left at Welcome to the Whitcombs and head to the southwest corner of the boulder field. This one is to the right of Bice and the Unknown problem that sits to the right of Bice.

content.description: Start sitting and climb the short prow. Notice the "brass knuckles" feature as you ascend. The top may need a fresh brush.
content.location: About 100 feet to the left of Black Out/Electric Island boulder.

content.description: Start sitting, and move right on slopers. Top out just before you run into the tree on the right. Keep your center of gravity lowww. :)
content.location: Down the hill and to the left of the Tofurkey Boulder and the Electric Island (Black Out) boulder. It likely needs a fresh brushing.

content.description: Sit start on a ok left pinch and a bad right hand crimp. Bump the left hand up and dyno.Grade is an estimate - could be easier - could be harder. Rename it when you send it!
content.location: To the right of Bootywork.

content.description: Start on a big rail, move right onto the arete, and then left onto the face to finish on an easy slab. A sit would make it quite a bit harder.The slab may need a brushing.
content.location: On the rock tier just above FIN.

content.description: Start with a left hand side pull, and a right hand pinch. Make a big move up and left to a crimp, and then top out.
content.location: Electric Island Boulder - Just south of the Tofurkey boulder.

content.description: Start sitting and climb a rail that leads up and left.
content.location: The southwest most boulder in the boulder field. Take a left at Welcome to the Whitcombs.

content.description: Start sitting just to the left of the JC Experience. Traverse right all the way to the Arete passing an interesting crux right before trending up.
content.location: Just left of The JC Experience. Opposite of Tim Duncan.

climbs.name: Arete Left of Deep Fried Turkey

content.description: Start low with a right hand undercling and left hand crimp. Move right to a jug, and then up the arete.Undone. Grade is an estimate. Rename it when you send it.
content.location: Tofurkey boulder. Left of Deep Fried Turkey.

content.description: Start as for Shots fired, head straight up into a bad side pull
Start sitting, and then move up and left onto a tiny rail. Bust a couple of big moves up and left, and top out on decent slopers and edges. The top probably needs a fresh clean up.
content.location: On an immaculate face about 20 yards to the right of Tofurkey. Right in the middle of the boulder field.

content.description: Secluded area with great boulders, lots of opportunity for development
